about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the dark and intense world of "Renounced", a hardcore survival RPG where each day is a struggle for survival in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by nuclear war. Explore abandoned settlements and dangerous ruins, collect resources, and engage in thrilling battles with enemies.

In "Renounced", you'll face challenging situations where every decision you make could have a significant impact on your life. A diverse progression system allows you to develop a wide range of skills, from weapon proficiency to survival techniques in harsh environments.

You'll need to take into account not only your character's health but also factors like bleeding, pain, shock, and psychological state. Every injury can affect your combat ability and your ability to perform daily tasks, adding a strategic element to every decision.

Crafting plays a crucial role: gather resources from the environment to create unique items, weapons, and armor that can help you survive in this unforgiving world. Adapt to the ever-changing environment by using your skills, finding new strategies to defeat enemies and overcome obstacles.

The game offers an atmospheric and unique visual style that transports you to a world where the hope for salvation seems far away. You can interact with a variety of non-player characters (NPCs) who not only engage in trading, bartering, but they also share fascinating stories from their past, filled with both hope and disappointment. These NPCs can become valuable allies or dangerous foes, so it is important to be cautious in your actions and decisions. Building relationships with them can significantly impact your survival, unlocking new opportunities and paths to explore. Gather your courage and embark on perilous adventures. Only the bravest in "Renounced" will survive and unravel the mysteries of this destroyed world! 

Raid System

Each raid will be unique. The maps generate random loot, enemies and other activities. This makes almost every raid unique.

Deep Health System

In addition to the usual HP you will be required to repair many different injuries (bleeding, bullet wounds, lacerations, contusions, etc.). In addition, you will have to be treated for radiation exposure and monitor your mental health.

Variety of Enemies

There are many different enemies in Renounced. Wild animals (such as wolves and bears), different kinds of people (bandits, military, merchants and their guards), as well as neutral animals (rabbits, deer). More are planned with updates.

Maximum hardcore

If you die - lose not only the things found in the raid, but also the equipment that was with you at the beginning of the raid.

Unique trading system

In order to trade - you need to personally bring the merchant things. Also their assortment is dynamically changing. In addition to buying goods for money, traders will gladly exchange different loot for unique equipment.

Tasks system

Task will fail on your death, which will result in loss of reputation with the merchant in addition to loss of loot. Therefore, realistically assess your strength before taking on a merchant task. It may be better to come to him another time, when he will have a new task for you. Doing them is very important, as it is one of the fastest ways to improve your reputation with the merchant, besides trading with him.

Many different equipment and weapons

The game features over 400 different types of different equipment and about 50 different weapons. More are planned with updates.

Versatile Skills 

“Renounced" has an versatile skill system. They are divided into 3 categories: physical, mental and practical. Each of the skills carries an improvement of 4 certain characteristics. Besides chemistry and crafting, they unlock new recipes to create items. For example, improving the skill “strength” the character will get an increase in weight, running speed, health and stamina. Even deeper development of the skill system is planned for the future.

*And much more...

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of violent deaths, tobacco and alcohol use, and foul language.
